short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Help raise money for student medical needs with the SMFI Tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension replaces the default New Tab with our custom tab hosted at https://www.smfinitiative.com/tab/tab.html. This was created by Student Medical Fund Initiative.

This tab offer may more features from the default Tab along with a better design. This tab has a notes section, to do list, bookmarks, and custom image modifier.

Furthermore, for University of Connecticut students, it has all the shortcuts required for school such as HuskyCT and StudentAdmin.

The purpose of this app is to forward out mission (found at https://www.smfinitiative.com/) to help create a medical fund for students at the University of Connecticut. Download this extension to help forward this mission!

Currently, this extension replaces the existing New Tab page with the page hosted on https://www.smfinitiative.com/tab/tab.html. This means that every time you open a new tab, the browser automatically redirects you to the page hosted at https://www.smfinitiative.com/tab/tab.html. 

Note: The only APIs this page uses is to fetch the daily joke and favicons. This page does not collect information, tracking data, etc.
